verbs.description: withsave (third-person singular simple present withsaves, present participle withsaving, simple past and past participle withsaved)

examples:
And few there ys but fyrſt or laſta tyme in loue ones ſhall they haue& glad I am my tyme ys paſthenceforthe my fredome to wͭſaue
1831 translation:
And few there is but first or last, A time in love once shall they have; And glad I am my time is past, Henceforth my freedom to withsave.
